questionBody.p: The word wound has more than one meaning. It is also pronounced differently depending on the meaning. Choose the sentence in which wound means "wrapped around something."

simpleChoice.p: Tallie could see from the swelling that her cat had a wound on its back paw.
After a lot of discussion, we wound up going to a movie we had all seen before.
Before Grandma began to knit, she wound her yarn around a piece of cardboard.
The knife was sharp enough to wound a person who touched it.
